alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 6:19AM CDT until April 27 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN JACKSON COUNTY... At 619 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Escatawpa, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Moss Point, Escatawpa, Wade, Helena, Big Point, Hurley, Vancleave and Hickory Hills. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 68 and 71. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
